1387594420195930117.text: President Biden presented a clear vision for this country and he has the policies and political will to make it a reality. After listening to his speech, I’m feeling even more inspired to get this work done.

1387594419205967880.text: Best of all, we can fully pay for the American Families Act and the American Jobs Act without raising taxes on anyone who makes less than $400,000 a year.

1387594417855418368.text: The American Families Plan would make it easier to get into the middle class and stay in the middle class. In the United States of America, pre-school, quality child care, and paid leave should not be luxuries reserved only for the lucky few.

1387594416832012293.text: Tonight President Biden demonstrated why he is the statesman our country needs right now. You could feel his empathy toward people who are struggling through no fault of their own – and you could see his resolve when he talked about his plans to help them.

1387594415733100554.text: Our country is doing far better now than it was when President Biden took office. He could have spent the whole speech bragging about that, but instead he chose to focus on the future.
